downgrade.description: Your remaining subscription value will be converted to more days in the lower plan. No refund will be issued.
downgrade.title: Downgrade Plan

renew.description: Renewing will add {days} days to your current subscription.
renew.title: Renew Subscription

upgrade.description: Your remaining subscription value will be converted to days in the new plan. You only pay the difference.
upgrade.fullyCovered: Your remaining subscription fully covers this upgrade! No additional payment required.
upgrade.title: Upgrade Plan
